result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Statewide, SIGNED by SJN on 10/5/22.  c: SCSO. bph

10:50 AM CO: SJN, RPR: V. Deiss, Clerk: K. Anderson, Attorney Erica Ellenwood in court for State of Wisconsin, Defendant Joseph Scott Mayer not in court. INCLUDES 22CM443, 22CT169, 22FO360, 2022FO361 and 22TR1999. Set for STC. Court notes that DE requested this morning to appear by Zoom but was not approved. 22CM443 and 22CT169: State requests warrant. Court issues WARRANT - body only, statewide. State requests default on FO and TR cases. 22FO360: Court defaults DE and order fine $295 - 60 DTP. 22FO361: Court defaults DE and order fine $295 - 60 DTP. 22TR1999: Court defaults DE and order fine $175.30 - 60 DTP. Adjourned. kma

2:44 PM CO: SJN, RPR: V. Deiss, Clerk: B Harris,  Defendant Joseph Scott Mayer in court.  Prosecuting attorney Erica Ellenwood in court for the State of Wisconsin. Includes 22CM443, 22CT169, 22FO000360, 2022FO361, 22TR1999.  Court reviews files and questions DE on status of Atty.  DE believes he'll qualify for PD at this time, Court directs DE to contact PD's office. ADA Ellenwood asking to schedule this out to check status of Atty.  Adjourned at 2:53 PM. bph

Filed by DA's Office. km

INCLUDES 22CM443 and 22CT169 

- It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Shayleen Faughn.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping. 

- Not to operate a motor vehicle without a valid drivers license and IID.

1:53 PM CO: SJN, RPR: V. Deiss, Clerk: K. Anderson, Attorney Erica Ellenwood and Intern Ali Casey in court for State of Wisconsin, Attorney Jeremiah James Harrelson in court for Joseph Scott Mayer. Defendant Joseph Scott Mayer appeared by video, in custody. INCLUDES 22CM443 (INIT), 22CT169 (INIT), IN: 22FO360, 22FO361 and 22TR1999. Atty. Harrelson states that he did not speak with DE today. DE states that he wishes to represent himself. DE is on PO hold. 22CM443: Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands. NG. 22CT169: Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands. NG. IN: 22FO360, 22FO361 and 22TR1999: NG pleas entered by DE. Court sets STC for attorney status, SETC and PSC. Adjourned: 2:00 PM. kma
